title: Start Page
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want the start page to give me an overview over all node types\
So I can quickly determine where I might find the information I am looking for
description:
* the start page is always available â†’ status code \`200\`
* the start page shows one section for each node type (brand, car model, image, etc.)
* each section contains 
  * information about the node type (name, amount of nodes, short description)
  * a link to the respective overview page
  * a thumbnail or icon or emoji that represents the node type
